appSubtitle: Your culinary assistant for delicious meals.
addIngredientsPrompt: Add the ingredients you have on hand to find recipes.
whatToCook: Know what you want to cook?
enterRecipeToFind: Enter a recipe name to find it.
tryTheseRecipes: Or, Try One of These Recipes!
saveRecipesPrompt: Save your favorite recipes here by clicking the heart icon on a recipe's detail page.
cacheWarningCookbook: Note: Your cookbook is saved in your browser's local cache.
apiKeyRequiredDescription: Please add your Google AI API key in the settings to use the app.
noRecipesFoundDescription: We couldn't find any recipes with your ingredients. Try adding more!
failedToGenerateRecipes: Failed to generate recipes. Please try again.
couldNotFindSurprise: Couldn't find a surprise recipe for you.
failedToFindSurprise: Failed to find a surprise recipe.
failedToLoadRecipe: Failed to load recipe details. Please check your API key and try again.
canGoBack: Changed your mind? You can go back.
couldNotGenerateDescription: Could not generate a description for this step.
failedToGetAdviceDescription: Sorry, we couldn't get troubleshooting advice right now.
confirmRemoveCookbook: This will permanently remove '{{recipeName}}' from your Cookbook.
dontAskAgain: Don't ask me again for the next 5 days
manageSettings: Manage your application settings and preferences.
addApiKeyInSettings: Please add your Google AI API key in the settings.
cacheWarningApiKey: Your key is stored only in your browser's local cache.
apiKeyRemovedDescription: Your API Key has been removed. The app may not function correctly.
manageAllergensDescription: Select common allergens or add your own to filter recipes.
addIngredientsDesc: Search for ingredients or add your own custom ones.
searchOrAdd: Search or add a custom ingredient...
createVariationDescription: Modify '{{recipeName}}' to suit your taste or available ingredients.
removeIngredientsDescription: Select ingredients from the original recipe to exclude.
addAddonsDescription: Add new ingredients to the recipe. Separate with commas.
unavailableEquipmentDescription: List any cooking equipment you don't have. Separate with commas.
noChangesRequestedDescription: Please select ingredients to exclude or provide additions.
couldNotCreateVariation: We couldn't create a viable variation with those changes.
failedToGenerateVariation: Failed to generate recipe variation. Please try again.
describeTheProblem: Describe the problem you're facing. What's not working as expected?
troubleshootPlaceholder: e.g., "My sauce is too thin," or "The chicken is burning on the outside but raw inside."
